mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.control_state, t.lot_no, t.eqp_status, t.connection_status, t.recipe_code, t.day_yield, t.lot_yield, t.lot_yield_eqp, t.lock_flag, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT count(eqp_id) COUNT,EQP_STATUS FROM fab_equipment_status WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 GROUP BY eqp_status ORDER BY eqp_status
mapper.update: update FAB_EQUIPMENT_STATUS set LOT_NO = #{lotNo}, update_date = now() where EQP_ID = #{eqpID}
mapper.select: select step_code, max(lot_no) lot_no , sum(lot_yield) lot_yield , min(eqp_status) eqp_status from fab_equipment_status t left join fab_equipment e on t.eqp_id = e.eqp_id where line_no= #{lineNo} and e.department = #{department} and step_yield_flag='1' group by step_code order by max(e.sort_no)
select station_code,count(*) count, count(*)*4896 lot_yield from mes_lot_wip where end_time is not null group by station_code

SELECT t.eqp_id eqpId, t.alarm_name alarmName, t.start_date startDate, f.MODEL_NAME modelName FROM edc_ams_record t LEFT JOIN fab_equipment f on t.EQP_ID=f.EQP_ID and f.del_flag=0 WHERE f.active_flag = 'Y' and f.department = #{department} group by f.eqp_id order by f.sort_no
